# /(_:_:)

**Operator**

Divide a measurement by a scalar value.

## Declaration

```swift
static func / (lhs: Measurement<UnitType>, rhs: Double) -> Measurement<UnitType>
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: A measurement to divide.
- **rhs**: A double-precision floating-point number to divide by.

## Return Value

A measurement of value `lhs.value / rhs` with the same unit as `lhs`.

## Operating on a Measurement

- ***(_:_:)**: Multiply a scalar value by a measurement.
- ***(_:_:)**: Multiply a measurement by a scalar value.
- **+(_:_:)**: Add two measurements.
- **+(_:_:)**: Adds two measurements of the same dimension.
- **-(_:_:)**: Subtract two measurements of the same Unit.
- **-(_:_:)**: Subtract two measurements of the same Dimension.
- **/(_:_:)**: Divide a scalar value by a measurement.
